reviewtext: I may not be listed as an actual purchaser of this item because i returned the two broken pieces. In the past couple of years I have owned this item, had good service from it, and felt satisfied even when a part broke. This time, it cracked into two pieces within the first hour of ordinary use without any particular strain - it is possible that I received a headset with aged, fragile plastic. Amazon honored my request to return and credit the cost of purchase.
